alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 9:02AM MST until December 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow showers expected. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. Snow bands may develop this afternoon and evening, with short periods of intense snow greater than 1 inch per hour. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys. Highway 93 Arlee to Whitefish. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow will combine with gusty winds to reduce visibility and create hazardous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
